Name: CM REPRESSURIZATION
checklistText:
CM Repressurization

	
	a.	Norm Mode (time ≈21 min)

Panel 325:
		CAB PRESS RELF vlv (2) - NORM
			(safety latch on)

Side hatch:
		CAB PRESS DUMP vlv - close (CW)
			(verify)

Panel 2:
		O2 PRESS IND sw - SURGE TK

Panel 326:
		REPRESS PKG vlv - FILL

Panel 601:
		REPRESS O2 - OPEN
Panel 2:
		CRYO O2 PRESS 1 ind - 150 psia
			min
Panel 326:
		REPRESS PKG vlv - OFF
Panel 2:
		CAB PRESS ind - 3.0 psia
			(in 1 min)

Panel 602:
		REPRESS O2 PRESS ind - 0.0 psig

Panel 601:
		REPRESS O2 - CLOSE

Panel 351:
		CAB REPRESS vlv - open (CW)
Panel 2:
		CAB PRESS ind - 4.7-5.3 psia
		O2 PRESS IND  sw - TK 1
Panel 351:
		CAB REPRESS vlv - OFF (CCW)


	b.	Alternate Mode (time ≈48min)
Panel 325:
		CAB PRESS RELF vlv (2) - NORM
			(safety latch on)

Side hatch:
		CAB PRESS DUMP vlv - close (CW)

Panel 351:
		EMER CAB PRESS sel - BOTH
		CAB REPRESS vlv - open (CW)

Panel 2:
		O2 PRESS IND sw - SURGE TK
			CRYO O2 PRESS 1 ind - 150
				psia min

Panel 351:
		EMER CAB PRESS sel - OFF
		CAB REPRESS vlv - adj to
			150 psia min
Panel 2:
		CAB PRESS ind - 4.7-5.3 psia
		O2 PRESS IND sw - TK 1
Panel 351:
		CAB REPRESS vlv - OFF (CCW)
